brainly_data.question: What was it about Truman's background that helped make him a good president? A. He spent his entire adult life as a public servant. B. He had experience in a wide variety of jobs. C. He was a close friend of FDR's and learned a lot from him. D. He wrote many books on the history of American government.
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: What was it about Truman's background that helped make him a good president? A. He spent his entire adult life as a public servant. B. He had experience in a wide variety of jobs. C. He was a close friend of FDR's and learned a lot from him. D. He wrote many books on the history of American government.
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: Answers A and B are both correct.
